thing-type.description: Minoston Smart Dimmer Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtIn-Wall Switch (Dimmer)</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtAdd the MS13Z from the existing Z-Wave home control network with your primary controller.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.</li&gt <li&gt When prompted by your primary controller, click the Up or Down button three times in one second.</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtInclude MS13Z to/from a Z-Wave Gateway with supporting Security.The MS13Z can support the Primary Controller that implemented the security S2.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtRemove the MS13Z from the existing Z-Wave home control network with your primary controller.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.</li&gt <li&gt When prompted by your primary controller, click the Up or Down button three times in one second.</li&gt </ul&gt
